data.name: plUsername.Text
data.value: User Name:

data.name: plUsername.Help
data.value: Enter your User Name here. In most cases this will be your email address.

data.name: SendPassword.Text
data.value: Send Password

data.name: EnterCode.Text
data.value: Enter Your Verification Code

data.name: LoginFailed.Text
data.value: Login Failed. Please remember that passwords are case sensitive

data.name: UserLockedOut.Text
data.value: This account has been locked out after too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please wait 10 minutes before trying to login again. If you have forgotten your password, please try the Password Reminder option before contacting an Administrator.

data.name: PasswordSent.Text
data.value: If the details entered were correct, you should receive a new email shortly with a link to reset your password.

data.name: EnterUsername.Text
data.value: Please Enter Your User Name

data.name: ControlTitle_sendpassword.Text
data.value: Reset Password

data.name: plCaptcha.Text
data.value: Security Code

data.name: plCaptcha.Help
data.value: Enter the security code.

data.name: PasswordRetrievalDisabled.Text
data.value: Password retrieval is disabled on this site. Please contact an administrator for assistance in retrieving your account details.

data.name: CaptchaText.Text
data.value: Enter the code shown above in the box below

data.name: InvalidCaptcha.Text
data.value: Incorrect Security Code

data.name: plQuestion.Text
data.value: Password Question:

data.name: plQuestion.Help
data.value: The password question you have provided

data.name: plAnswer.Text
data.value: Answer

data.name: plAnswer.Help
data.value: Enter the answer to the Password Question

data.name: plEmail.Help
data.value: You can provide the email address you used on registration to retrieve your password.

data.name: plEmail.Text
data.value: Email Address:

data.name: EnterUsernameEmail.Text
data.value: Please Enter Your User Name or the Email Address you used during Registration

data.name: cmdLogin.Text
data.value: Proceed to Login

data.name: DisabledPasswordHelp.Text
data.value: Password retrieval is disabled on this site.

data.name: RequiresQuestionAndAnswer.Text
data.value: You also must provide the answer to the question you provided on registration.

data.name: RequiresUniqueEmail.Text
data.value: You can request the email by providing your email address or your username.

data.name: ResetPassword.Text
data.value: Reset Password

data.name: ResetPasswordHelp.Text
data.value: This website does not support password retrieval. However, you can have a new random password generated for you, which will be sent to the email address you provided during registration.

data.name: MultipleUsers.Text
data.value: More than one user has been found with this email address. Please enter your User Name and try again.

data.name: OptionUnavailable.Text
data.value: Reset Password option is currently unavailable.

data.name: SMTPNotConfigured.Text
data.value: Mail failed to send. SMTP not configured.

data.name: hlLogin.Text
data.value: Cancel

data.name: ResetTokenHelp.Text
data.value: If you forgot your password an email with a password reset link will be sent to your registered address. Click on the link in that email and you will be taken to a page where you can then create a new password.

data.name: ResetToken.Text
data.value: Send Reset Link

data.name: EmailNotFound.Text
data.value: We could not find an account with that e-mail address. Please try again.
